item.description:
Lyman Orchards Fall Corn Maze!

Our four acre craftily-carved cornfield maze offers a fun, educational source of entertainment for all ages! If you have a poor sense of direction, don't worry! Maps, educational materials, interactive 'passports', and trivia challenges are available to help you find your way.

Also, not everyone you'll meet in the maze is lost! Our specially trained 'corn cops' are on duty at all times, ensuring that rules are followed and to point you in the right direction.

For more information, and a printable $1.00 off coupon, go to

www.lymanorchards.com/events/corn_maze.shtml

Rain cancels this event.

Please call my cell if you have any questions 860.227.7498
item.how_to_find_us: Let's meet at the entrance to the corn maze.
item.name: Lyman Orchards Corn Maze
